SheffCare is a registered charity which provides day care, escorted hospital visits, short-term care, over night care and long-term residential care for older people. Aims to provide the very best care, whether it's short or long-term. Escorts clients who need help in attending hospital, optician or doctor's appointments.
Offers financial advice and guidance to clients and their families regarding local authority funding and possible 'top-up' funding. Can give advice and support to people who receive direct payments. Helps individuals to manage their care budget.
